history.text: so have you seen this movie before
I have not seen this movie but I love biographies! How do you feel about them?
I lovee them too because its real life things
the movie is great because it is based on a real guy who portrayed an airplane pilot a surgeon wrote bad checks all over well made the checks i should say
The cast of Leonardo Dicaprio , Tom Hanks  and Christopher Walken are sure to make the movie a hit!
oh definitely they are amaing actors leonardo portrayed frank abagnale perfectly
It appears that the ratings were pretty good as far as movies go, but a little lower than I would expect considering the cast. Maybe it's because it was a crime movie.
the real frank started working for the fbi instead of going to jail he started helping them find check fraud checks people make themselves
maybe its because people dont know what a good movie is
And of course...being Directed by Steven Spielberg ...makes me lean towards the "gotta see it" side.
The Title of "catch me if you can" is intriguing.
oh yeah one of the best directors of all time he makes amazing movies and this is one of them
I'm in awe of the fact that he was able to steal over 2 million dollars by pretending to be other people!~
That is some serious, albeit scary, skill!
yeah at at the age of 16 i believe he did all that very smart to be able to do everything he did and get away with it for so long
he wastrying to not be like his parents losing there house he acted as a teacher at the age of 16 and he pulled it off
and like it says when he ran out of money he became someone else and scams people
very smart for being so young

It appears that his bakground had something to do with spurring him on to be a con. He comes from a broken home. PArents divorced...mother committed adultery , father in trouble with IRS forcing them to get a smaller home.
and like you said getting 2.8 million at that young age is amazing
It's almost like he was taking control where he had none before and making sure he never had the financial torubles his fgamily had....well...for awhile at least.
oh yeah and he just didnt want to live that way so he ran away and pursued adult jobs
so he finally gets caught after running so long and doing so many different jobs pilot,surgeon,teacher.and when he gets out his pops dies and he is so hurt by it
He misses the thrill of the chase....and almost messes up again...but thinks better of it and begins working for the FBI to help catch other bank frauds.
when he is told hiss dad died by the detective who was bringing him back to he states to go to jail he escapes out the toilet from the airplane so he could go to his old home and see
Yeah! He then finds his mother with the man she left his father for....
Do you generally watch movies with A- ratings?
yeah and like you said tells the detective he has a fraudelent check and the setective has him start working for he fbi and as he starts like you said he starts thinking maybe i should run
but he gets his head back on and decides to come back and continue working with fbi fraud
I really love hearing how it all ended.
Happily married for 26 years!
so after all that exciting stuff that has happened to him it all ended good for him getting married
3 kids living very happy and is a millionare like he always wanted to be
And this time...earning it in a reputable way!
Which actor would most likely make you want to see this film?>
leonardo dicaprio
because he was the main character and i have always liked his acting you?
I would have to say the same, although the combination of he and Tom Hanks DEFINITELY sparks my interest.
well i give it a thumbs up and would like to here more about the real guy who did it

you have to see it it was a great mopvie def worth your time they did a great job on the movie
and portraying the real guy

and like it said he has caught some of the worlds most elusive money forgers so thats awesom
yeah def see it great movie thank you for the chat i think this is about all we can say
